channel.title: [317] help with coding something! [317]
channel.description:
Source: Delta
Hey Guys Im making this new thing and I need it so if you have items equiped then the npc says you have to bank them but I am having trouble, how can i add this for every single item that is being worn.
All i have so far is this one
[code]if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 3753[/code] what would i change the "3753" too.
Thanks
